back.title: Internship
back.subtitle: Software Engineer
back.body: During internship, I was responsible for improving observability of the whole system. There were many aspects involved ranging from working on Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to monitoring applications with telemetry data. In this short period of time, I have managed to gain a high level of confidence working on cloud platforms, especially GCP as well as being able to learn and implement new tools into production pipeline in a very short amount of time.

front.title: Cloud Computing
front.subtitle: Work Experiece
front.body: Experience with Cloud Computing gained from Internship

back.title: Cloud Computing
back.subtitle: Engineering
back.body: I spent a large portion of my time designing and writing the ETL pipeline following Serverless Architecture to massively cut down the cost from high frequency Kubernestes Cron Job. Consequently, I am quite familiar with GCP and Kubernestes but also, learned a lot from designing a scalable, distributed system.

front.title: Arm11 Emulator & Assembler
front.subtitle: C Project
front.body: First year final project - program a simple emulator and assembler for an ARM1176JZF-S processor

back.title: Arm11 Project
back.subtitle: Emulator & Assembler
back.body: This is the compulsory part of our first year project where we had to design and program a simplified emulator and an assembler that is able to translate assembly code into binary, then execute it similar to how an actual processor will.

front.title: Tetris Plus Plus
front.subtitle: C Project Extension
front.body: First year final project extension - a new twist to the classic game! Choose from a range of different AI-powered bots or exercise while playing with our 'active' mode!

back.title: Tetris Plus Plus
back.subtitle: Bringing joy to lockdown with this new game!
back.body: This project is an extension to our final year project where we chose to rewrite the classic Tetris game from scratch using only C standard libraries which can be played in a terminal. This comes with various difficulties and modes. One of the more exciting mode is the 'battle' mode which you can play against a selection of our bots including one trained using Q-Learning and one using Genetic Algorithm. We even offer an 'active mode' where with the help of a Raspberry Pi and motion sensor, you can physically move the blocks by running around!

back.title: Outing

back.body: In the span of 24 hours, my team has been able to build an app to help with organising social events and everything was made from scratch including both back-end and front-end. Check it out  at https://devpost.com/software/outing-c0i8dw !
